title: From BurstFire to Challenger - Episode #65 - Camille Jungle vs Riven

embed.description: follow me on twitter: https://twitter.com/BurstFire301 discord: burstfire#8072 donate link: https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=565LGQR978WT2

body: first time camille in ranked? well not quite i have played her twice before but its been like 6 months. gl hf

replies.body:
That matchmaking sucks, you got 2 silvers + 3 golds vs 5 golds. 

I thought you were gonna just play top lane?

i think riot matchmaking is pretty good considering such low player population in oce. i was going to play top lane but ive role swapped to fill. it allows me to play more champs and more styles and helps me not get bored/zoned out which happens if i play the same role/champs too much. so far its working well
